Class ClubAbstractEntity.ButtonsHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • ClubAbstractEntity.ButtonsHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionListener, Serializable, EventListener
    Enclosing class:
    ClubAbstractEntity

    private class ClubAbstractEntity.ButtonsHandler
extends Object
implements ActionListener, Serializable
    This Class implemets ActionListener and Serializable.
    ButtonsHandler handles okButton and cancelButton.

    • Constructor Detail

      • ButtonsHandler

        private ButtonsHandler()

    • Method Detail

      • actionPerformed

        public void actionPerformed(ActionEvent event)
        This method is invoked when okButton and cancelButton are pressed.
        okButton - first checks ClubAbstractEntity.validateData() if it returns true it will proceed to ClubAbstractEntity.commit(), enable cancel button with Component.setEnabled(boolean) and hide the JFrame.
        cancelButton - invokes ClubAbstractEntity.rollBack() and then sets JFrame visibility to false.
        Specified by:
        actionPerformed in interface ActionListener
        Parameters:
        event - Holds the current event.
